NewMonopoly

Class GCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • NewMonopoly.GCounter

  • class GCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Global Counter. Keeps track of global int values used throughout the game
    Author:
    Unknown

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GCounter()
      Default constructor.
      GCounter(int c)
      Used if a preset int value is to be the start of the count

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCount()
      Adds 1 to the counter
      void addCount(int c)
      Adds 1 to the counter and then modulates the counter by c
      int getCount()
      Returns the current count being stored
      void setCount(int c)
      Sets the counter to a specific number
      void subCount()
      Removes 1 from the counter

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GCounter

        public GCounter()
        Default constructor. Begins the counter at 0

      • GCounter

        public GCounter(int c)
        Used if a preset int value is to be the start of the count
        Parameters:
        c - int value in which to start the counter

    • Method Detail

      • addCount

        public void addCount()
        Adds 1 to the counter

      • addCount

        public void addCount(int c)
        Adds 1 to the counter and then modulates the counter by c
        Parameters:
        c - int by which to limit the counter to

      • subCount

        public void subCount()
        Removes 1 from the counter

      • setCount

        public void setCount(int c)
        Sets the counter to a specific number
        Parameters:
        c - int by which to start counting from

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Returns the current count being stored
        Returns:
